name: Flytrap - No econ
description: Flytrap style deck with no money in it. Cheap ice and not much of it, draw added by jackson. If they play tag me, psycho out all agenda and recur with archived memories. If they avoid tags bernice, ghost branch, breaking news and big brother come into play.

name: Flytrap - Draw
description: Card draw replaces econ. Same general flytrap strategy. Psycho + archived memories punishes tagme decks. Jackson + anonymous tip lets you have low ice count and just throw agendas in the trash if you have too many. Cheap cards means you don't need much econ to function.

name: Jinteki Alan (S01W01 Liga do Kobold)
description: Deck está redondo focado em combo de Scorched Earth, Tag e Trap.

name: Mac Acelerada (S01W01 Liga do Kobold)
description: Deck Hacker ainda fraco pela configuração, mas o deck é altamente acelerado e sempre fica em média com 6-10 cartas todos os turnos. Bem acelerado o jogo e muito bom. Só tem o defeito de fazer pouca grana, mas enfim, paciência.
